==Descriptions==
{{Description|A member of a loosely-organized mercenary corps from the golden desert sands. Will work for anyone as long as the pay is good.<br>These ax-wielding ladies often wade into the slaughter without fear, creating openings for their comrades to capitalize on.<br>They will sometimes sit by the fireside in their sand-swept homeland and play songs that were lost in that golden sea.|[[Archive]]}}
